alert.note: Alert for San Diego (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 13 at 2:56PM PDT until August 13 at 3:15PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM PDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL SAN DIEGO COUNTY... At 255 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Warner Springs, or 14 miles north of Julian, moving east at 5 mph. The storm produced wind gusts to 55 mph and very heavy rain. Flooding reported on Highway 79. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Julian, Valley Center, Warner Springs, Palomar Mountain, Hwy 79 Between Oak Grove And Aguanga, Hwy 79 Between Warner Springs And Oak Grove, Hwy 79 Between Santa Ysabel And Warner Springs, Lake Henshaw, Palomar Mountain State Park and S7 - East Grade Rd. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
